messages.subject: Hi!  Another newbie!
messages.msgSnippet: Hello Everyone! I m Michelle and I m here to learn more about unschooling as an option for my two children.  We ve been to private school, public school, home
messages.messageBody:
Hello Everyone!
I'm Michelle and I'm here to learn more about unschooling as an option
for my two children. We've been to private school, public school, home
school and presently we are doing charter school. I truly enjoyed the
freedom of homeschool, but feared perhaps I wasn't doing enough. So we
switched to charter school and none of us are very happy about the
sheer volumn of work. To me it seems like a lot of it is wasted time
on information they don't need at this time and won't remember later on
when they may actually use it. I would love to hear how you came to
unschooling and what your experience has been.
